sentences.en: dewdrops sparkling in the morning sunlight
Do drop in at the Dewdrop Inn.
sentences.cn: 到露珠旅馆要进内一坐.

sentences.en: Eng: How much dew would a dewdrop drop if a dew - drop could drop dew?
sentences.cn: 英格: 假如一颗露珠会掉下露水,那么一颗露珠会掉下多少露水 呢 ?

sentences.en: How much dew could a dewdrop drop if a dewdrop did drop dew?
sentences.cn: 如果露珠落下露水,露珠能落下多少滴露水?

sentences.en: How much dew does a dewdrop drop if dew drops drop dew?
sentences.cn: 一滴露珠能滴下多少露水,如果露珠可以滴下露水?

sentences.en: How much dew would a dewdrop drop if a dewdrop could drop dew?
sentences.cn: 如果露珠可以滴下露水,那么它能滴下多少露水 呢 ?

sentences.en: How much dew would a dewdrop drop it a dewdrop could drop dew?
sentences.cn: 如果一颗露珠会掉露水,那么一颗露珠会掉小多少露水 呢 ?

sentences.en: How much dew would be a dewdrop drop if a dewdrop could drop dew?
sentences.cn: 如果一滴露珠会掉下露水,那么一滴露珠会掉下多少露水?

sentences.en: Howdew would a dewdrop drop if a dewdrop could drop dew?
sentences.cn: 一颗露珠会掉下露水,一颗露珠会掉下多少露水 呢 ?

sentences.en: Jingying small dewdrop, Camellia girl to dress up a beautiful and fresh.
sentences.cn: 晶莹的小露珠, 把茶花姑娘打扮得美丽、清新.

sentences.en: Look at the light ensphered in a dewdrop.
Our God in His gracious thirst will drink us all, the dewdrop and the tear.
sentences.cn: 我们的神一点也不吝啬, 他把露滴和眼泪一同饮进我们的喉腔.

sentences.en: The dude dropped in at the Dewdrop Inn for a drop of drink.
sentences.cn: 那个家伙进了露滴酒店喝了一杯.

sentences.en: The Gardener 27 Pleasure is frail a dewdrop, while it laughs it dies.
sentences.cn: 《园丁集》27、欢乐像露珠一样脆弱, 在笑声中便会陨落.

sentences.en: Up close, you may a dewdrop or an insect sitting on a leaf.
sentences.cn: 再近些, 你还要可以看见树叶上的露珠和昆虫.

sentences.en: We miss each other in different place . Endless missing coagulates to clear and translucent dewdrop.
sentences.cn: 我们彼此遥念,让不尽的相思,凝结成晶莹透明的露珠.
